casebody.data:
Max NACHT and Jacob Terner, Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 324. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 14, 1937. Harold L. Turk, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Harold L. Turk and Eugene J. Epstein, both of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellants. Leo J. Hickey, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Vine H. Smith, James G. Scileppi, and Frank J. Parker, Asst. U. S. Attys., all of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
